name: Oniria Times
description:
-= Welcome to Oniria =-

You are in charge of the first newspaper of the world of dreams. Choose carefully what news should go to the frontpage. Take care of your income and reputation. Be careful with sensationalist news and uncover the secret plots of Oniria.

You will play 7 key moments in the history of Oniria, and your decisions can change the world.

Features:

  • 50 funny news separated in 7 days
  • Secret plots among the news
  • 2 alternative endings
  • Statistics of your publications
  • Jazz music
  • More than 5 minutes of play!

Learn about Oniria, media, and yourself.
